snippet: An independent watchdog agency gave preliminary approval to a facility in the city of Satsumasendai that could become the first to restart after the 2011 Fukushima disaster.
abstract: Nuclear plant in southern Japan clears initial safety hurdle that could make it the first nuclear facility to restart under new safety regulations designed after 2011 Fukushima disaster.
lead_paragraph: An independent watchdog agency gave preliminary approval to a facility in the city of Satsumasendai that could become the first to restart after the 2011 Fukushima disaster.

headline.main: Japanese Nuclear Plant Is First to Get Go-Ahead Under New Rules
headline.print_headline: Japanese Nuclear Plant Is First to Get Go-Ahead Under New Rules
